detectors.description:
SimpleMixer.withdraw(uint256) () performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- userEffectiveNumDeposits = depositValue / deal.claimValueInWei ()
	- userExtraBalance = userEffectiveNumDeposits * extraBalance / effectiveNumDeposits ()
detectors.markdown:
[SimpleMixer.withdraw(uint256)]() performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [userEffectiveNumDeposits = depositValue / deal.claimValueInWei]()
	- [userExtraBalance = userEffectiveNumDeposits * extraBalance / effectiveNumDeposits]()

detectors.description:
SimpleMixer.withdraw(uint256) () performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- userEffectiveNumDeposits = depositValue / deal.claimValueInWei ()
	- withdrawedValue = depositValue + deal.claimDepositInWei * userEffectiveNumDeposits + (userExtraBalance / 2) ()
detectors.markdown:
[SimpleMixer.withdraw(uint256)]() performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [userEffectiveNumDeposits = depositValue / deal.claimValueInWei]()
	- [withdrawedValue = depositValue + deal.claimDepositInWei * userEffectiveNumDeposits + (userExtraBalance / 2)]()

detectors.description:
SimpleMixer.withdraw(uint256) () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- deal.startTime + deal.claimDurationInSec > now ()
	- deal.startTime + deal.depositDurationInSec + deal.claimDurationInSec > now ()
detectors.markdown:
[SimpleMixer.withdraw(uint256)]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [deal.startTime + deal.claimDurationInSec > now]()
	- [deal.startTime + deal.depositDurationInSec + deal.claimDurationInSec > now]()

	- deal.startTime + deal.claimDurationInSec + deal.depositDurationInSec < now ()

detectors.description: Parameter SimpleMixer.dealStatus(uint256)._dealId () is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in SimpleMixer.withdraw(uint256) ():
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(withdrawedValue) ()
	- ! msg.sender.send(withdrawedValue) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Withdraw(msg.sender,dealId,withdrawedValue,publicWithdraw,true,all good) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [SimpleMixer.withdraw(uint256)]():
	External calls:
	- [! msg.sender.send(withdrawedValue)]()
	- [! msg.sender.send(withdrawedValue)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Withdraw(msg.sender,dealId,withdrawedValue,publicWithdraw,true,all good)]()
